items.title: Potential Fed chair pick David Zervos of Jefferies backs aggressive interest rate cuts
items.description: The Jefferies strategist told CNBC that central bankers shouldn't be daunted by the PPI showing inflation pressures hotter than expected.

items.title: Wholesale prices rose 0.9% in July, much more than expected
items.description: The producer price index was expected to show a 0.2% increase for July, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

items.title: Economist Sumerlin confirms he's in the running for Fed chair, backs big interest rate cut
items.description: Sumerlin said on CNBC that lowering the Fed's key rate would be an easy decision now.

items.title: As Trump berates Goldman, other economists agree that higher tariff inflation is coming
items.description: Goldman Sachs is taking the heat for its call that heavier tariff-induced consumer inflation is ahead, but it's far from alone in that view.

items.title: Goldman stands by call that consumers will bear the brunt of tariffs after Trump blasts bank's economist
items.description: Goldman Sachs economist David Mericle on Wednesday stood by a controversial forecast that tariffs will begin to hit consumer wallets.
